comment: Cinnamon, spice, and most things nice.  Spicy, but not harsh .  Nose of orange, citrusy, but with weird sweetish thing going on.  Nice when you are looking for something with lots of pop and zing... not a mellow drink.
Spice spice.  Spiciest whiskey I ever tasted.

harsh nose, vanilla and caramel. strong oak flavour. peppery rye.

after taste not bad lingers with spice
